Key Match Events: Collin Sexton recorded a boost in the second half
Lauri Markkanen led the way with 24 points
The Jazz cut the deficit down to one point in the third
Phoenix led by as much as 16 in the game and Utah never held a lead
Pre-Game Insights: Jazz Injury Report: Multiple players out due to injuries
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz will return to Delta Center for a two-game homestand
Jazz fans are going to have a lot of fun watching Taylor Hendricks and Cody Williams play together with their length and skill for several years to come
Miscellaneous Highlights: Elijah Harkless making his NBA debut
Lauri Markkanen has the only Jazz basket as they trail the Suns 8-2 with 8:35 left in the first quarter
Svi Mykhailiuk leads the Jazz with 9 points off the bench
Cody Williams had a career night scoring 11 points
Collin Sexton has given the Jazz a boost in the second half
The Jazz trimmed the Suns lead to as few as one, but Phoenix rallied for a quick six points and own a 75-68 lead with seven minutes left in the third
